text: The 1982 Asian Games, officially known as the IX Asian Games, was a sports event in Delhi, India. It occurred from November 19 to December 4, 1982. There were 196 events from 21 sports and disciplines. Category:1980s in India Category:1982 in sports Category:New Delhi Category:Sport in India Category:Asian Games by year Category:1982 in Asia
title: 1982 Asian Games
